name: Git Milk (Cheyanne Wheat)
description:
Git Milk is a voice command game I made for my Exploration Gaming Tech class.

My team and I were exploring voice command and how to works within video games. We all wrote the epic story together!

Team:

  • Cheyanne Wheat - Game Developer
  • Eli Jones - Voice Command Programming
  • Michael Segnar - Researcher / worked on mini-games (they didn't make it in)

We only had 2 weeks for development and research.

Created Spring 2020.
